channel.title: 2001 - Influence Skill
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Welcome[/size]
I'm just wondering if anyone remember the influence skill in 2001? It's been replaced by quest points since [i](if that helps).[/i] I've got to admit I prefer the QP but I just wondered if anyone remembers the influence skill.[/center]

item.title: 2001 - Influence Skill
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

Silvion if you wish to find out about these sorts of things I would suggest you venture into the RSC dev section where people actually have a clue about it. When RSC was out the kids in this section were like 5.

Read full topic

item.title: 2001 - Influence Skill
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Yes, it was changed during 2001. You must have just missed it. RuneScape was dead back then anyway, look at it now though. :.

Read full topic
